primevc.core.Bindable_Int

type
class
implements
primevc.core.traits.IClonable<Bindable_Int>
IBindable<Int>

Constructor

new(?val : Int)

Instance Variables

change(default,null) : primevc.core.dispatcher.Signal2<IntOldValue<Int>>

Dispatched just before "value" is set to a new value. Signal argument: The new value.

value(default,setValue) : Int

Instance Methods

bind(otherBindable : IBindableReadonly<Int>) : Void

Makes sure this.value is (and remains) equal to otherBindable's value. In other words: - update this when otherBindable.value changes

clone() : Bindable_Int

dispose() : Void

inline isEmpty() : Bool

pair(otherBindable : IBindable<Int>) : Void

Makes sure this Bindable and otherBindable always have the same value. In other words: - update this when otherBindable.value changes - update otherBindable when this.value changes

inline set(val : Int) : Void

Sets value directly, without the requirement to be in edit mode, and without dispatching any events.

inline toString() : String

unbind(otherBindable : IBindableReadonly<Int>) : Bool

see
IBindableReadonly
